thread.title: Pa. bill seeks end to state court elections

title: Pa. bill seeks end to state court elections
text:
Published By: Philly News Local - Today 
HARRISBURG - A proposal to end elections for statewide judgeships -- in favor of a system that would combine "merit selection" and retention...
